articles.title: Second Brisbane team could enter NRL by 2022 as V’landys aims to ‘dominate Queensland’ - Fox Sports
articles.description: Brisbane could have its second NRL team by 2022, with the ARL Commission set to consider adding a 17th team to the competition in less than two years’ time.
articles.content: There are reportedly four bids on the table to become Brisbanes second team, with Queensland Cup sides Ipswich, Redcliffe and Easts, along with the Brisbane Bombers outfit likely to put forward propo… [+2466 chars]
